name: upgrade_inventory
description: Increase inventory slot by 1.(MAX 16 TOTAL SLOTS)

name: potion_healing
description: Heal your pet. Cannot be used during battle. Goes into inventory.

name: rob_protection
description: Protect yourself from being robbed once.

name: transport_bicycle
description: (LVL10) Leg day! Travel in 4min,no costs per travel.

name: transport_car
description: (LVL20) Faster than a lawn mower! Travel in 3min but costs $10 for fuel each travel.

name: transport_boat
description: (LVL30) Make Aquaman jealous! Travel in 2min but costs $200 for fuel each travel.

name: transport_helicopter
description: (LVL40) Forget traffic! Travel in 1min but costs $500 for fuel each travel.

name: transport_portalgun
description: (LVL50) The cake is a lie! Travel instantly but costs $25,000 for energy each travel.
